text.ops: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for January, resulting in a gap of 17.8 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops2: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for February, resulting in a gap of 20.4 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops3: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for March, resulting in a gap of 22.6 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops4: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for April, resulting in a gap of 25.3 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops5: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for May, resulting in a gap of 27.7 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops6: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for June, resulting in a gap of 30.4 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops7: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for July, resulting in a gap of 33.0 degrees Fahrenheit, which is the highest monthly gap.
text.ops8: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for August, resulting in a gap of 32.8 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops9: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for September, resulting in a gap of 32.1 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops10: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for October, resulting in a gap of 28.5 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops11: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for November, resulting in a gap of 22.7 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.ops12: Calculate the absolute difference between Average high and Average low temperatures for December, resulting in a gap of 18.1 degrees Fahrenheit.
text.last: Take the highest calculated gap of 33.0 degrees Fahrenheit (from July) and the lowest gap of 17.8 degrees Fahrenheit (from January), then compute their signed difference: 33.0 minus 17.8, which equals 15.2.
